template.s: .dynamicAdvertContainer{cursor:pointer;line-height:1;width:300px;height:250px;border:1px solid #000}.qb-frame{position:initial;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;color:#fff}.bg-image{height:100%}.bottom-box{position:absolute;top:138px;background:green;width:300px;height:112px}.quickbooks-main-heading{position:absolute;left:-300px;top:151px;width:214px;height:36px;font-size:19px;line-height:18px;margin:0 13px;animation-duration:2s,5s;animation-timing-function:ease-out;animation-fill-mode:forwards;opacity:0}.quickbooks-main-heading.animate{animation-name:slidein,fade-up}.quickbooks-main-heading.static{opacity:1}.quickbooks-sub-heading{position:absolute;top:201px;width:197px;height:21px;font-size:10px;margin:0 13px;animation:1s ease-out 2s,3s forwards 2s;opacity:0}.quickbooks-sub-heading.animate{animation-name:slideup-copy,fade-up}.quickbooks-sub-heading.static{opacity:1}.cta{position:absolute;top:223px;padding:3px 22px 4px 17px;background-color:#000;border-radius:8px;font-size:10px;font-weight:500;margin:0 13px;animation:1s ease,1.5s forwards;opacity:0}.cta.animate{animation-name:moveup-cta,fade-up}.cta.static{opacity:1}.quickbooks-logo{position:absolute;top:223px;left:200px;width:86px;height:17px;object-fit:contain;transform:scale(1);transform-origin:top left}img{width:100%}@keyframes slidein{from{left:-300px;opacity:0}to{left:0;opacity:1}}@keyframes slideup-copy{from{top:201px}to{top:191px}}@keyframes fade-up{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes moveup-cta{from{top:240px}to{top:223px}}
